Package renderer

Class ThreadPool<T>

java.lang.Object
renderer.ThreadPool<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the parameter for the thread's job
public class ThreadPool<T>
extends java.lang.Object
This class is handling a thread pool.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  ThreadPool.ParamGetter<T>
    The ParamGetter<T> should be implemented in order to give the thread pool's threads a parameter when they start a new job.
    static interface  ThreadPool.Runnable<T>
    The Runnable<T> should be implemented in order the thread pool's threads to run with a given parameter.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description

    private int _numThreads  
    private ThreadPool.Runnable<T> _target

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ThreadPool()
    Default constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void execute()
    Executes all the threads with the given getter and target.
    int getNumThreads()
    Returns the number of threads.
    boolean isRunning()
    Returns if the thread pool is currently using any threads.
    void join()
    Joins all the threads.
    ThreadPool<T> setNumThreads​(int numThreads)
    Chaining method for setting the number of threads the thread pool will use.

    Chaining method for setting the method in order to give the threads the parameter for their job.

  • Constructor Details

    • ThreadPool

      public ThreadPool()
      Default constructor. Sets the number of threads to use all the cores minus 2 for spare (it will always be greater than 0).

  • Method Details

    • getNumThreads

      public int getNumThreads()
      Returns the number of threads.

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      Returns if the thread pool is currently using any threads.

    • setNumThreads

      public ThreadPool<T> setNumThreads​(int numThreads)
      Chaining method for setting the number of threads the thread pool will use.
      Parameters:
      numThreads - the number of threads
      Returns:
      the current thread pool
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when numThreads is greater or equals to 0

    • setParamGetter

      public ThreadPool<T> setParamGetter​(ThreadPool.ParamGetter<T> getter)
      Chaining method for setting the method in order to give the threads the parameter for their job.
      Parameters:
      getter - implementation of ThreadPool.ParamGetter<T>
      Returns:
      the current thread pool
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when getter is null

    • setTarget

      public ThreadPool<T> setTarget​(ThreadPool.Runnable<T> target)
      Chaining method for setting the threads' job.
      Parameters:
      target - implementation of ThreadPool.Runnable<T>
      Returns:
      the current thread pool
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when target is null

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes all the threads with the given getter and target.
      Throws:
      java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - when already executing or missing 1 of getter and target

    • join

      public void join()
      Joins all the threads.
